directions.step:
Combine juice and sugar into a large pan. Place over moderate heat and bring to a boil. Stir in Certo and bring to a full rolling boil and continue at a full rolling boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat, skim and bottle at once.
This is from way back in the late 60's.
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
